features: The bökee makes it easier to prepare baby bottles with one hand. Whether you use baby formula or breast milk, avoid juggling baby in your arms while making a bottle.

Essential breastfeeding and pumping accessory to avoid spills; keeps silicone pumps like the Haaka and top heavy flange bottles from tipping over. Keeps bottles steady while transferring milk from a bag.
Created by parents with a sleek modern aesthetic and functional design; making this a great baby shower gift and newborn essential without cluttering the kitchen.
Compatible with most standard and wide mouth bottles, sippy cups, and pump parts; BPA-free, lead-free and phthalates-free; easy to clean and top-rack dishwasher safe.

Suction is key to using the bökee correctly. Simply press down firmly on a hard, smooth and dry surface (just like anything that requires suction), nestle the bottle inside and apply gentle pressure while twisting. Packaging may vary.
body.description: The bökee makes late nights, early mornings, and round-the-clock moments a little bit easier for new parents with one-hand bottle prep enabling you to better hold and soothe your baby. Ideal for standard & wide mouth bottles such as comotomo, Nanobebe Flexy Evenflo, Dr. Brown’s, Nuk and MAM. Made of food grade silicone, the bökee is BPA-free, lead-free and phthalates-free and is top rack dishwasher safe. A smart solution that allows you to prep bottles and sippy cups with one hand. Keep breast milk from spilling when using the bökee. It keeps silicone pumps and bottles with top-heavy flanges from tipping over, or you accidentally knocking it over! Compatible with Haaka, Medela, and Spectra pumps and bottles. Mix formula, open a medicine bottle or food jar, and prepare a sippy cup for your toddler with one-hand ease. Suction is key to using the bökee correctly. Simply press down firmly on a hard, smooth and dry surface (just like anything that requires suction), nestle the bottle inside and apply gentle pressure while twisting. The bökee's suction will hold your bottle in place so it can be opened, filled and closed with just one hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and useful!
reviews.reviewText: If it can prevent a spill, why not? One downside is the suction doesn’t work very well, even on a flat surface it loses its grip. I think the silicone at the bottom is too thick and rigid. However it’s weight still helps it do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Kids, But Purchased This As GREAT Gift For New Parents
reviews.reviewText: I have a TON of friends who are having kids. Not wanting to get the traditional diaper gift or clothes that the baby will outgrow in a couple months, I found the bökee! After purchasing for a couple friends (at first), they replied with "we didn't know what it was at first, but now that we know -- we LOVE IT!" and "I had no idea I needed this until I needed an extra hand to prep the bottle." Since then, I use this as my go-to gift for new parents. It's unique, it's compact and it's practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work great for when you have a babe in one arm and need to make a bottle or disperse your milk from pumping. You don’t have to apply any downward pressure, but you do have to spin your container/bottle a couple times for it to “catch” and stay put so you can loosen or tighten the lid. Wow, these are a game changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love the color, I got the mint one. The plastic is sturdy and does not feel cheap. However, the suction power is just okay. You definitely need a smooth surface for it to stay put. I’ve washed it by hand and allowed it to air dry and it is still in great condition. It is helpful when making bottles for my baby while using one hand but only if it’s sucking well onto the surface it’s on, otherwise it will not work. I have it on my nightstand and use it during nighttime feedings to prep the bottle. I don’t use it on my kitchen counters because my counters are not completely smooth so it does not work well there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works fine but not essential
reviews.reviewText: It works as promised, but we really haven’t gotten much use out of it. Easier to put the baby down and make the bottle than anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you don't know, now you know
reviews.reviewText: If you don't have one, get one. For the one time low price it is so worth the convenience it brings Especially when you only have one hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband insisted I get this for him, as he stays home with the baby all day. He said it’s like having that extra hand he needs when making bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this not thinking I would truly need it but I use it all the time . Works great ! Highly recommend!
